branchCategory.name: C(D)S2, Double Acting, Single Rod, Port Option
branchCategory.description: <p>Series CS2-XC3 double acting, single rod, non-lube air cylinder with port location option.  Aluminum die-cast is used for both the rod and head covers, which keep the actuator light weight.  This series is available in bore iszed 125mm, 140mm and 160mm.</p>
